children.label: For patients 18 years or older
children.outcome: Authorization for Wegovy™ (semaglutide), may be approved when all of the criteria are met

children.label: Adjunct to a reduced calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management
Greater than or equal to 30 kg/m^2 (obese)
Greater than or equal to 27 kg/m^2 (overweight) in the presence of at least one weight-related comorbidity (e.g., hypertension, type 2 diabetes mellitus, or dyslipidemia)
Wegovy will not be coadministered with other semaglutide-containing products or with any other GLP-1 receptor agonist
For patients aged 12 to 17 years
children.outcome: Authorization for Wegovy™ (semaglutide), may be approved when all of the criteria are met

children.label: Adjunct to a reduced calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management
Initial BMI at the 95th percentile or greater, standardized for age and sex (obesity)
Wegovy will not be coadministered with other semaglutide-containing products or with any other GLP-1 receptor agonist
